explanation: [0-0] A man wearing glasses with black frames, a blue shirt, and jeans is standing on a path next to a hedge, making a phone call. He has his hand on his hip. There is a white wall behind him, and a few electric wires can be seen above his head.

[0-2] As the man is talking on the phone, a dark-skinned arm suddenly enters the frame from his left side and snatches the phone. The man is stunned for a moment before looking at the hand that was holding his phone.

[0-2] As the man is talking on the phone, a dark-skinned arm suddenly enters the frame from his left side and snatches the phone. The man is stunned for a moment before looking at the hand that was holding his phone.

[2-6] The man then turns his head and body backward, and the camera pans slightly to the left, revealing a man without arms, wearing a black shirt and pants, standing behind him. The two men look at each other for a moment, then the man in blue walks briskly toward the man in black and suddenly slaps him hard across the face. A red "BANG!" caption appears in the middle of the screen. The man in black turns his head to look at the man in the blue shirt, then hangs his head in a wronged manner, and the camera zooms in.

[10-13] The man in black looks up at the man in blue after hanging his head in a wronged manner. The man in blue walks towards him and stretches out his hands as the camera zooms in. The man in blue hugs the man in black.

[17-23] The scene changes to show the man in black taking a wallet from the pocket of the man in blue and hiding it. The scene switches back to the two men continuing to hug, then the man in blue lets go and slowly steps back. The man in blue stretches out his hand and shakes hands with the man in black.
